SENTENCE.STRING: (born 30 June, 1930), is an American economist, political writer, and commentator, generally from a socially conservative and economically laissez faire perspective.
is presently a senior fellow at Stanford University's Hoover Institution.
won the Francis Boyer Award, presented by the American Enterprise Institute.
was awarded the National Humanities Medal for prolific scholarship melding history, economics, and political science.
According to conservative British author Paul Johnson: "America's leading philosopher is Thomas Sowell.
He has given me more than any other living American philosopher..."
